406.simple_description: Increases Skill DMG when Dodge effect is triggered.

407.simple_description: Increases Non-DoT Crit Rate when skills and Ultimate Skills hit.

408.simple_description: Increases ATK and DEF when attacked.

409.simple_description: Increases the Combat Resources charge speed when Dodge effect is triggered.

410.simple_description: Increases ATK after normal attacks crit.

411.simple_description: Increases Crit Rate when Dodge effect is triggered.

412.simple_description: Increases Skill DMG when normal attacks hit.

413.simple_description: Increases ATK when Dodge effect is triggered.

414.simple_description: Increases Mod Index Multiplier according to the enemy's HP when hits are landed by the Mod.

415.simple_description: Gains a Shield when Dodge effect is triggered.

416.simple_description:
Extends Zero Time triggered by the Mod.
Increases Skill DMG when in Zero Time.

417.simple_description: Increases Skill DMG when expending Combat Resources based on Combat Resources expended.

418.simple_description: Increases Crit Rate and Crit DMG dealt when skills and Ultimate Skill hit.

419.simple_description:
Increases DMG dealt to the attacker when Dodge effect is triggered; effect can not be stacked.
Shortens the remaining Dodge effect CD each time Extremity Dodge is triggered.

420.simple_description:
Increases Non-DoT DMG on enemies in Abnormal States.
Abnormal States: Trauma, Scorch, Stun, Freeze, Shackle, and Confuse.

421.simple_description: Gains a Shield based on the team leader's max HP at the start of battle and when HP drops below a certain level for the first time. When the Shield shatters, it unleashes a circle of diffusing waves, knocking back the surrounding enemies and dealing to them Water DMG.

423.simple_description: Increases Ultimate Skill charge speed when Dodge effect is triggered.

424.simple_description: Inflicts Armor Break on the enemy hit. This effect has a CD and can not be stacked.

109901.simple_description:
Equipping by Sakubo - Tsukuyomi grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>Sakubo: Moonlit Night</color> with <color=#297DE0>Sakubo: Final Moon</color>.
When Divine Grace is at max, the CD of <color=#297DE0>Sakubo: Final Moon</color> is reset.
Shortens the charge of <color=#297DE0>Bo: Final Moon</color> and increases DMG dealt by the secondary blade waves.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Sakubo - Tsukuyomi grants the following effects:
Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>Sakubo: Moonlit Night</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Sakubo: Final Moon</color>.
Every normal attack hit grants extra Divine Grace. Gains Unyielding when charging.
When Divine Grace is at max, the cooldown time of <color=#297DE0>Sakubo: Final Moon</color> is reset.
Shortens the charge time of <color=#297DE0>Bo: Final Moon</color> and increases its Base DMG.

103801.simple_description:
Equipping by Radiant Feather - Hera grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 2: <color=#297DE0>Blazing Embrace</color> with <color=#297DE0>Burning Dance</color>.
Increases DMG dealt to enemies with Scorch by <color=#297DE0>Burning Dance</color>.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Radiant Feather - Hera grants the following effects:
Skill 2: <color=#297DE0>Blazing Embrace</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Burning Dance</color>.
Hits landed on enemies with Scorch using <color=#297DE0>Burning Dance</color> deal more Non-DoT Base DMG.
Increases the Base DMG of <color=#297DE0>Solar Blaze</color>.

103901.simple_description:
Equipping by Tidal Song - Poseidon grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 1: <color=#297DE0>Grace of the Sea</color> with <color=#297DE0>Blue Whalesong</color>.
When healing the Mod or teammates with <color=#297DE0>Blue Whalesong</color>, increases the Mod or teammate's Combat Resources charge speed while also granting certain amount of Combat Resources.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Tidal Song - Poseidon grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 1: <color=#297DE0>Grace of the Sea</color> with <color=#297DE0>Blue Whalesong</color>.
Increases healing effect.
At the start of battle, increases the Mod's Skill DMG based on the healing effect boost.
When healing the Mod or teammates with <color=#297DE0>Blue Whalesong</color>, increases the Mod or teammate's Combat Resources charge speed while also granting certain amount of Combat Resources.

104802.simple_description:
Equipping by Comet R4Y - Zenkibo Tengu grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 1: <color=#297DE0>Precision Bombing</color> with <color=#297DE0>Repeat Bombardment</color>.
Increases the number of strikes with <color=#297DE0>Repeat Bombardment</color>, with subsequent strikes dealing a gradually reduced amount of DMG.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Comet R4Y - Zenkibo Tengu grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 1: <color=#297DE0>Precision Bombing</color> with <color=#297DE0>Repeat Bombardment</color>.
Increases the number of strikes with <color=#297DE0>Repeat Bombardment</color>, with subsequent strikes dealing less DMG to the same enemy.
Increases the Base DMG of <color=#297DE0>Guided Strike</color> and <color=#297DE0>Pulsation</color>.

106601.simple_description:
Equipping by Early Sakura - Ookuninushi grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill: <color=#297DE0>BunBun Gunner</color> with <color=#297DE0>BunBun Strike</color>.
The higher the Exclusive Functor level, the higher the Non-DoT Base DMG of <color=#297DE0>BunBun Strike</color> and its drag radius.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Early Sakura - Ookuninushi grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill: <color=#297DE0>BunBun Gunner</color> with <color=#297DE0>BunBun Strike</color>.
The higher the Exclusive Functor level, the higher the Non-DoT Base DMG of <color=#297DE0>BunBun Strike</color> and its drag radius.
Increases Crit DMG when the Mod or a Teammate is in any <material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(106601)>Divination</material> state.

108401.simple_description:
Equipping by New Pact - Verthandi grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 1: <color=#297DE0>Rapid Stab</color> with <color=#297DE0>Quick Stab</color>.
Grants Divine Grace and increases DMG when casting <color=#297DE0>Quick Stab</color> or <color=#297DE0>Enlightening</color>.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by New Pact - Verthandi grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 1: <color=#297DE0>Rapid Stab</color> with <color=#297DE0>Quick Stab</color>.
Grants Divine Grace and increases Independent DMG when casting <color=#297DE0>Quick Stab</color> or <color=#297DE0>Enlightening</color>.

109301.simple_description:
Equipping by Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi grants the following effects:
Launches a Shuriken attack at the locked-on enemy after casting <color=#297DE0>Heaven's Hold</color>, dealing Physical DMG. Unleashes an AoE impact to surrounding enemies after casting <color=#297DE0>Earth's Hold</color>, dealing Physical DMG.
The higher the Exclusive Functor level, the higher the DMG dealt by <color=#297DE0>Ninjutsu</color>.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi grants the following effects:
Shortens the CD of <color=#297DE0>Heaven's Hold</color> and <color=#297DE0>Earth's Hold</color>.
After Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi casts <color=#297DE0>Heaven's Hold</color>, a Shuriken attack is unleashed at the locked-on enemy, dealing Physical DMG. Use of <color=#297DE0>Earth's Hold</color> leads to one round of area DMG to surrounding enemies which causes Physical DMG.
The higher the Exclusive Functor level, the higher the Independent DMG dealt by <color=#297DE0>Ninjutsu</color>.
Casting the Ultimate Skill no longer expends <material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material>.

101901.simple_description:
Equipping by Gusty Lance - Shu grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>Breach</color> with <color=#297DE0>Breakthrough</color>.
Increases Crit Rate and Crit DMG when <color=#297DE0>Breakthrough</color> hits only one enemy.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Gusty Lance - Shu grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>Breach</color> with <color=#297DE0>Breakthrough</color>.
Increases the Non-DoT Crit Rate and Crit DMG of <color=#297DE0>Breakthrough</color>.
All teammates deal more Wind DMG when <color=#297DE0>Breakthrough</color> hits.

108001.simple_description:
Equipping by Frost Fang - Vidar grants the following effects:
Replaces the normal attack <color=#297DE0>Icefield Hunter</color> with <color=#297DE0>Frostbite</color>.
Normal attack has a certain chance of inflicting Freeze on enemies in front when landing a hit. Gains additional Rage whenever an enemy in a Freeze is hit by normal attack. When normal attacks hit, deals Ice DMG to other enemies not directly hit by the Mod's normal attacks within range. This damage is taken as skill damage.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Frost Fang - Vidar grants the following effects:
Replaces the normal attack <color=#297DE0>Icefield Hunter</color> with <color=#297DE0>Frostbite</color>.
Each normal attack has a certain chance of inflicting Freeze on enemies hit. Gains additional Rage when an enemy in a Freeze is hit by normal attack. When normal attacks hit, deals Ice DMG to other enemies in front not directly hit by the Mod's normal attacks. This damage is taken as skill damage.
Normal attacks lower the Ice RES of enemies hit.

105001.simple_description:
Equipping by Shinku - Buzenbo Tengu grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 2: <color=#297DE0>Scarlet: Cloud Water</color> with <color=#297DE0>Scarlet: Ashen Star</color>.
The cross light blade travels a certain distance and grants additional Traces while also inflicting Armor Break upon hitting an enemy.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Shinku - Buzenbo Tengu grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 2: <color=#297DE0>Scarlet: Cloud Water</color> with <color=#297DE0>Scarlet: Ashen Star</color>.
The cross light blade travels a certain distance and grants additional Traces while also inflicting Armor Break upon hitting an enemy.

114801.simple_description:
Equipping by Surefire - Zenkibo Tengu grants the following effects:
Increases Trace limit.
Increases DMG with every Trace expended.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Surefire - Zenkibo Tengu grants the following effects:
Increases Trace limit.
Increases DMG with every Trace expended.

102701.simple_description:
Equipping by Drifting Flurry - Leviathan grants the following effects:
Replaces the Dodge skill <color=#297DE0>Refraction</color> with <color=#297DE0>Stormy Counter</color>.
Tapping on the Normal Attack button within a certain time after a successful Break-fall while the Dodge effect is not in CD or after a Dodge effect is triggered will launch a skill attack, dealing Ice DMG and inflicting Freeze on enemies hit. 
Break-fall can also trigger a Dodge effect without sending it into CD.
Increases counterattack DMG.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Drifting Flurry - Leviathan grants the following effects:
Replaces the Dodge skill <color=#297DE0>Refraction</color> with <color=#297DE0>Stormy Counter</color>.
Tapping on the Normal Attack button within a certain time after a successful Break-fall while the Dodge effect is not in CD or after a Dodge effect is triggered will launch a skill attack, dealing Ice DMG and inflicting Freeze on enemies hit. 
Break-fall can also trigger a Dodge effect without sending it into CD.
Increases counterattack DMG.
Dodge triggers the Dodge effect, and the Dodge effect will last for a period of time.

109401.simple_description:
Equipping by Darkstar - Hel grants the following effects:
Reduces Divine Grace cost when firing with Cannon Tower and increases the Base DMG of cannon shots.

103701.simple_description:
Equipping by Dark Mistletoe - Hodur grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>Striking Arrow</color> with <color=#297DE0>Phantom Blast</color>.
Increases max DMG from passive effects.

101101.simple_description:
Equipping by The Innocence - Osiris grants the following effects:
Mod may access the L3 effect of all Aether Codes gained.
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 1.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by The Innocence - Osiris grants the following effects:
Mod may access the L3 effect of all Aether Codes obtained.
The Base DMG of Skill 1 is increased.
The Base DMG of Skill 3 is increased.

119901.simple_description:
Equipping by Shinri - Tsukuyomi grants the following effects:
Increases ATK each time when the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material></color> is cleared or an enemy with <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material></color> is defeated.
The third move of <color=#297DE0>Thunder: Out of the Blue</color> now expends off all existing Rage, increasing the DMG dealt by the third move of <color=#297DE0>Thunder: Out of the Blue</color> depending on the amount of Rage expended.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Shinri - Tsukuyomi grants the following effects:
Increases ATK each time <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material></color> is cleared or an enemy with <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material></color> is defeated.
The first and second moves of <color=#297DE0>Thunder: Out of the Blue</color> no longer expend Rage. The third move of <color=#297DE0>Thunder: Out of the Blue</color> now expends all existing Rage when it hits, and deals increased Independent DMG based on how much Rage was expended.

118401.simple_description:
Equipping by Archaic Oath - Verthandi grants the following effects: 
Increases Thunder DMG whenever this Mod or other teammates get a Shield from <color=#297DE0>Protection of Faith</color>.
When the Shield from <color=#297DE0>Protection of Faith</color> is removed or refreshed, deals Thunder AoE DMG to enemies in range of an explosion that is triggered with the Mod at the center.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Archaic Oath - Verthandi grants the following effects:
Increases Thunder DMG and Skill DMG dealt whenever a member of the team gets a shield from <color=#297DE0>Protection of Faith</color>.
When the shield from <color=#297DE0>Protection of Faith</color> is removed or refreshed, it causes an explosion which deals Thunder DMG to enemies within range.
Use of <color=#297DE0>Counter Strike</color> taunts all enemies.
Hits landed with an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain instantly increases the Mod Index Multiplier.
Shortens the CD of <color=#297DE0>Protection of Faith</color>.

105901.simple_description:
Equipped by The Glare - Apollo grants the following effects:
Reduces the number of hits needed to trigger the passive effect.
Grants Energy when Crit DMG is dealt by the Mod, along with a certain chance of resetting the CD of <color=#297DE0>Interweaving Light</color>.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by The Glare - Apollo grants the following effects:
Fewer hits are needed to trigger the passive effect.
Grants Energy when the Mod deals Crit DMG, along with a certain chance of resetting the CD of <color=#297DE0>Interweaving Light</color>.
Increases the Non-DoT Base DMG of the follow-up attack.
Successful follow-up attacks also reduce the enemy's Light RES.

109601.simple_description:
Equipping by Windwalker - Hermes grants the following effects:
Tap on the Normal Attack button again after the final strike of a normal attack to launch a follow-up attack with <color=#297DE0>Ride with the Wind</color> at the cost of Rage. Launching <color=#297DE0>Ride with the Wind</color> attacks in this manner does not trigger CD.
The <color=#297DE0>Ride with the Wind</color> follow-up attack also reduces the Wind RES of enemies hit.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Windwalker - Hermes grants the following effects:
Tap on the Normal Attack button again after the final strike of a normal attack to launch a follow-up attack with <color=#297DE0>Ride with the Wind</color> at the cost of Rage. Launching <color=#297DE0>Ride with the Wind</color> attacks in this manner does not trigger CD.
The <color=#297DE0>Ride with the Wind</color> follow-up attack also reduces the Wind RES of enemies hit.

102601.simple_description:
Equipping by Airgetlam - Nuadha grants the following effects:
Increases Skill DMG of the <color=#297DE0>Bullet Hail</color> and <color=#297DE0>Ground Blast</color> charged to full.
Inflicts <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(102602)>Blaze</material></color> state on enemies hit by <color=#297DE0>Bullet Hail</color> or <color=#297DE0>Ground Blast</color> at full charge. Increases DMG dealt to the enemies already inflicted with <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(102602)>Blaze</material></color>.
Unleashing a fully charged skill on an enemy in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(102602)>Blaze</material></color> triggers an explosion, dealing AoE Fire DMG.

105801.simple_description:
Equipping by Ryugiri - Kagutsuchi grants the following effects: 
Increases ATK when the Mod is hit.
Casting <color=#297DE0>Fiery Dance: Alt</color> generates waves of flame that deal Fire DMG to enemies in their path. Grants extra Energy when more than one enemy is hit by <color=#297DE0>Fiery Dance: Alt</color>.
The higher the Exclusive Functor level, the higher the DMG dealt by the waves of flame.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Ryugiri - Kagutsuchi grants the following effects:
Increases ATK when the Mod is hit.
Casting <color=#297DE0>Fiery Dance: Alt</color> generates waves of flame that deal Fire DMG to enemies in their path; Grants extra Energy when more than one enemy is hit by <color=#297DE0>Fiery Dance: Alt</color>.
The higher the Exclusive Functor level, the higher the DMG dealt by the waves of flame.

109701.simple_description:
Equipping by Drowsie - Oneiroi grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 2: <color=#297DE0>Fairytale Illustrated</color> with <color=#297DE0>Garden of Dreams</color>.
While <color=#297DE0>Garden of Dreams</color> is active, all allies takes less DMG and inflicts enemies hit with the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(109703)>Dreamland</material></color> state. Inflicts Shadow DMG at regular intervals to all enemies in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(109703)>Dreamland</material></color> state.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Drowsie - Oneiroi grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 2: <color=#297DE0>Fairytale Illustrated</color> with <color=#297DE0>Garden of Dreams</color>.
While <color=#297DE0>Garden of Dreams</color> is active, increases the Base DMG of <color=#297DE0>Counting Sheep</color> and <color=#297DE0>Hollow Dream</color>.
While <color=#297DE0>Garden of Dreams</color> is active, all allies takes less DMG and inflicts enemies hit with the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(109703)>Dreamland</material></color> state. Inflicts Shadow DMG at regular intervals to all enemies in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(109703)>Dreamland</material></color> state.

113901.simple_description:
Equipping by Arctic Abyss - Poseidon grants the following effects:
Grants Energy for every certain number of hits.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material></color> state, increases the Ice DMG boost from <color=#297DE0>Zero Mansard</color> and the Ice RES reduction on enemies hit from <color=#297DE0>Matter Frozen</color>.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material></color> state, each time <color=#297DE0>Zero Mansard</color> or <color=#297DE0>Matter Frozen</color> is cast, increases the Base DMG of the skill cast.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Arctic Abyss - Poseidon grants the following effects:
Grants Energy for every certain number of hits.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material></color> state, increases the Ice DMG boost from <color=#297DE0>Zero Mansard</color> and the Ice RES reduction on enemies hit from <color=#297DE0>Matter Frozen</color>.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material></color> state, each time <color=#297DE0>Zero Mansard</color> or <color=#297DE0>Matter Frozen</color> is cast, increases the Base DMG of the skill cast.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material></color> state, grants extra Energy every second.
Shortens the remaining CD of <color=#297DE0>Snow Echo</color> when Mod exits <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material></color> state for the third or more time.

113801.simple_description:
Equipping by Phantasmal Dawn - Hera grants the following effects:
Replaces the Dodge skill <color=#297DE0>Phantasmal Lightdance</color> with <color=#297DE0>Feathers Fantastical</color>.
100% chance of triggering Dodge effect with Dodge. Hold down on the Dodge button to trigger an additional Dodge effect at the cost of Energy, this effect has its own CD. Increases DMG dealt by the Mod or other teammates affected by <color=#297DE0>Dawn Wish</color> when they are in Zero Time.

105601.simple_description:
Equipping by Thundertusk - Kali grants the following effects:
Grants an enhancement effect when Kali enters battle, triggers the Dodge effect, or enters Modified Mode for the first time.
Increases ATK each time an enhanced effect is cast.
The additional kick from the enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Shinra: Thunderweave</color> and the charge of the enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Shinra: Thousandbolt</color> will not be interrupted by Dodge. Simply tap on the skill again to continue the kick or the charge.

111101.simple_description:
Equipping by Living Soul - Osiris grants the following effects:
Increases Trace limit. When the Mod enters the battlefield, both the Mod and other Mods who have a preset Ultimate Skillchain with this Mod get Ultimate Skill charge.
When <color=#297DE0>Darkwing Scythe</color> is cast a second time when in CD, the second cast does not expend any Traces.
Intermittently restores HP whenever <color=#297DE0>Soul Death</color> hits. Expends all remaining Traces, increasing the DMG of <color=#297DE0>Soul Death</color> depending on the extra Traces expended.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld Mode</material></color>: Increases the DMG boost and HP recovery effects of <color=#297DE0>Soul Death</color> cast under this mode.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Living Soul - Osiris grants the following effects:
Increases Trace limit. When the Mod enters the battlefield, both the Mod and other Mods who have a preset Ultimate Skillchain with this Mod get Ultimate Skill charge.
When <color=#297DE0>Darkwing Scythe</color> is cast a second time when in CD, the second cast does not expend any Traces. <color=#297DE0>Spin of Death</color> no longer expends Traces, either.
Intermittently restores HP whenever <color=#297DE0>Soul Death</color> hits. Expends all remaining Traces, increasing the Independent DMG of <color=#297DE0>Soul Death</color> depending on the extra Traces expended.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld Mode</material></color>: Increases the DMG boost and HP recovery effects of <color=#297DE0>Soul Death</color> cast under this mode.

101301.simple_description:
Equipping by Rāhu - Asura grants the following effects:
Changes the state of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color>, enhancing its connection with <color=#297DE0>Fire Warp</color> while also changes the casting moment of the enhanced <color=#297DE0>Fire Warp</color>.
Increases the DMG of <color=#297DE0>Fire Warp</color> based on the amount of hits landed with normal attack when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color> state.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Rāhu - Asura grants the following effects:
Changes the state of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color>, enhancing its connection with <color=#297DE0>Fire Warp</color> while also changes the casting moment of the enhanced <color=#297DE0>Fire Warp</color>.
Increases the DMG of <color=#297DE0>Fire Warp</color> based on the amount of hits landed with normal attack when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color> state.
Shortens the CD of <color=#297DE0>Earth Shatter</color>.

103201.simple_description:
Equipping by AblaZe - Tyr grants the following effects:
Replaces the normal attack <color=#297DE0>Royal Raid</color> with <color=#297DE0>Royal Blitz</color>.
Increases DMG and changes the attack mode when the greatsword type in play is <color=#297DE0>Sword of Queen</color>.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by AblaZe - Tyr grants the following effects:
Replaces the normal attack <color=#297DE0>Royal Raid</color> with <color=#297DE0>Royal Blitz</color>.
Increases Trace limit. Grants extra Traces when <color=#297DE0>Promotion</color> is cast directly.
Increases Independent DMG and changes the attack mode when the greatsword type in play is <color=#297DE0>Sword of Queen</color>.

103501.simple_description:
Equipping by Croc Rage - Sobek grants the following effects:
Increases the attack frequency of <color=#297DE0>Roar of the Nile</color>.
Lowers the Water RES of enemies hit.

103301.simple_description:
Equipping by Enlightening - Heimdall grants the following effects:
Skill 3 <color=#297DE0>Lightrealm Ultimate</color> is replaced with <color=#297DE0>Gensrealm Ultimate</color>. 
Duration of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material></color> generated by <color=#297DE0>Gensrealm Ultimate</color> is extended, and the AoE radius is increased.
Teammates within the last generated <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material></color> gain Skill DMG boost at regular intervals.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Enlightening - Heimdall grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 3.
Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>Lightrealm Ultimate</color> is replaced with <color=#297DE0>Gensrealm Ultimate</color>. 
Duration of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material></color> generated by <color=#297DE0>Gensrealm Ultimate</color> is extended, and the AoE radius is increased.
Increases all Attribute DMG dealt by teammates when <color=#297DE0>Gensrealm Ultimate</color> is cast.
All teammates gain Ultimate Skill charge when <color=#297DE0>Gensrealm Ultimate</color> is cast.
Teammates within the last generated <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material></color> gain Skill DMG boost at regular intervals.

112701.simple_description: When equipped by Countertide - Leviathan, reduces the remaining CD of Undercurrent each time a Trace is successfully gained or when Azure Aid is cast. Casting Azure Aid generates an area that follows the Mod, reducing the Melee DMG RES of enemies within the area.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Countertide - Leviathan grants the following effects: Shortens the remaining CD of <color=#297DE0>Undercurrent</color> each time a Mark is obtained or <color=#297DE0>Azure Aid</color> is cast. Casting <color=#297DE0>Azure Aid</color> also creates an area that follows the Mod, which lowers the Melee RES of enemies hit within the area.
Increases the Base DMG of <color=#297DE0>Azure Aid</color>.

108101.simple_description:
Equipping by Waverender - Skadi grants the following effects:
Reduces the Ice RES of enemies hit with <color=#297DE0>Frostbreak</color> or <color=#297DE0>Crystal Smash</color>.
Increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt to enemies with lowered Ice RES. The more Ice RES is reduced, the more DMG is increased.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Waverender - Skadi grants the following effects:
Lowers the Ice RES of enemies hit with <color=#297DE0>Frostbreak</color> or <color=#297DE0>Crystal Smash</color>.
Increases DMG dealt to enemies with lowered Ice RES. The lower Ice RES an enemy has, the more DMG they take.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material></color>, automatically casts normal attacks to launch Piercer tracking missiles.
<color=#297DE0>Frostbreak</color> cast by blocking damage with the barrier formed will no longer expend <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material></color> Marks.

111901.simple_description:
Equipping by Flowfly Mist - Shu grants the following effects:
Increases the DMG of counterattacks and follow-up attacks.
Grants another extra follow-up attack or counterattack depending on the last stance selected if stance is switched while casting the follow-up attack or triggering the counterattack. The extra follow-up attacks or counterattacks launched in this way do not lead to another triggering of this effect.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Flowfly Mist - Shu grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of counterattacks and follow-up attacks.
Grants another extra follow-up attack or counterattack depending on the last stance selected if stance is switched while casting the follow-up attack or triggering the counterattack. The extra follow-up attacks or counterattacks launched in this way do not lead to another triggering of this effect.

104201.simple_description:
Grants the following effects when equipped by Puppet Master - Hades:
Increases Fixed DMG when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material></color> mode.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material></color> mode, Leuce and Mintha form blade-sharp rings made of a multitude of puppet strings at the enemy's position, dealing Shadow DMG when they launch a joint attack.
simple_strength_description:
Grants the following effects when equipped by Puppet Master - Hades:
Increases Fixed DMG when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material></color> mode.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material></color> mode, Leuce and Mintha form blade-sharp rings made of a multitude of puppet strings at the enemy's position, dealing Shadow DMG when they launch a joint attack.
Grants Super Armor and reduces DMG taken when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material></color> state.
Grants the next <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material></color> mark more quickly.
Where there are active <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material></color> marks, increases Mod's Crit Rate and Crit DMG by as if the mark count is full.

106801.simple_description:
Equipping by Cleansing Wind - Enlil grants the following effects:
Increases DMG dealt each time a <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material></color> Mark is gained.
Grants a <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material></color> Mark when the non-enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Stir in the Wind</color> is cast.
Grants the skill enhancement effects of the non-enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Stir in the Wind</color> when the enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Stir in the Wind</color> finishes casting.

106701.simple_description:
Equipping by Backflowing - Oceanus grants the following effects:
Crit Rate is increased.
Each normal attack that hits an enemy and each skill cast grants a combo stack, when the combo stacks are full, stopped, or interrupted, a Ghost is generated briefly that continuously attacks the locked on enemy. The amount of attacks launched by the Ghost depends on the combo stacks. The attacks from the Ghost do not grant more combo stacks, its attacks deal Water DMG and DMG is increased based on the number of combo stacks consumed.

104101.simple_description:
Equipping by Chord of Convallaria - Athena grants the following effects:
Increases DMG of <color=#297DE0>Sonic Boom</color>.
Automatic consumption of Divine Grace is reduced when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material></color> status. Enters <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104104)>Perfect Harmony</material></color> state after hitting with Harmonious Normal Attack strikes for a certain number of times when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material></color> state.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104104)>Perfect Harmony</material></color>: Grants Unyielding effect. No <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104102)>Harmony Judgement</material></color> will be triggered but every strike of normal attack and skill cast during this time will be directly judged as either Harmonious or Perfectly Harmonious, and any <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material></color> stack is considered a multiple.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Chord of Convallaria - Athena grants the following effects:
Increases the Independent DMG dealt with <color=#297DE0>Sonic Boom</color>.
Reduces the automatic expenditure of Divine Grace when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material></color> state. Triggers <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104104)>Perfect Harmony</material></color> state after a certain number of Harmonious normal attack hits are landed when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material></color> state.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104104)>Perfect Harmony</material></color>: Gains Unyielding when in this state. No <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104102)>Harmony Judgement</material></color> will be triggered but every strike of normal attack and skill cast during this time will be directly judged as either Harmonious or Perfectly Harmonious, and any <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material></color> stack count is deemed as a multiple. Also, when an attack is judged as Harmonious or Perfectly Harmonious, extra stack of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material></color> will be granted.
When casting an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material></color> state, the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material></color> stacks will be kept.
Expands the range of Perfectly Harmonious judgment.

102401.simple_description:
Equipping by Jackal - Anubis grants the following effects:
When <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material></color> attacks automatically, there is a certain chance to unleash a special attack that deals Shadow DMG and inflicts Stun on enemies hit.
When casting <color=#297DE0>Jackal Charge</color>, the joint attack by <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material></color> will carry an explosive effect, dealing Shadow DMG to enemies within a small range.
When casting <color=#297DE0>Jackal Whirl</color>, the joint attack by <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material></color> will become a special attack.
When casting <color=#297DE0>Jackal's Gaze</color> or <color=#297DE0>Jackal's Wild Slash</color>, <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material></color> will launch a joint attack or the special attack depending on the distance to the locked-on enemy.
Increases DMG of the special attack.

101601.simple_description:
Equipping by Wasteland Fiend - Kingu grants the following effects:
The Chainsaw Mode of <color=#297DE0>Assault Tactic</color> can interrupt the raising sword action of <color=#297DE0>Spinning Slash</color> and directly cut the enemy with the Wasteland Fiend.
When casting the Chainsaw Mode of <color=#297DE0>Assault Tactic</color>, gains Super Armor effect and increases Physical DMG upon hitting.
When in Modified Mode, casting the Chainsaw Mode of <color=#297DE0>Assault Tactic</color> or <color=#297DE0>Siege Tactic</color> will increase Skill DMG based on Divine Grace expended.

105201.simple_description:
Equipping by Rage Serpent - Marduk grants the following effects:
When a teammate casts a skill or Ultimate Skill, a drone that corresponds to either <color=#297DE0>Quick Response</color> or <color=#297DE0>Surround & Eliminate</color> will be randomly summoned, dealing corresponding Physical DMG and grants additional ATK to all members of the team.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(105203)>Rafale Mode</material></color>: Reduces Energy cost when a teammate summons drones in this mode; also increases Skill 2 Base DMG of all teammates.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(105204)>Bourasque Mode</material></color>: Increases Energy gain rate when a teammate summons drones in this mode; also increases Skill 3 Base DMG of all teammates.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(105205)>Whirlwind Mode</material></color>: When a teammate summons a drone in this mode, reduces the enemy's corresponding type of RES based on said teammates' DMG type and DMG amount.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(105206)>Hurricane Mode</material></color>: When a teammate summons a drone in this mode, their Crit Rate increases. Entering Zero Time while this effect is active will refresh the effect duration and shares the Crit Rate boost with other teammates.

101701.simple_description:
Equipping by Ailuros - Bastet grants the following effects:
Increases the Mod's Armor Pierce and Crit DMG; also greatly increases the Mod's Crit Rate when attacking enemies from behind.
Enters <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(101703)>Nightshadow</material></color> state when casting <color=#297DE0>Bastet's Caprice</color>.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(101703)>Nightshadow</material></color>: Disappears and gains a movement SPD boost. Increases the first damage dealt under this state. Mod exits the state after hitting an enemy or receiving damage.

102801.simple_description:
Equipping by Roaring Thunder - Thor grants the following effects:
While in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material></color> state, each skill hit triggers a thunderbolt that deals Thunder DMG. Each time <color=#297DE0>Mjölnir</color> is used to cast a non-derivative skill and a hit is landed, or when <color=#297DE0>Járngreipr</color> is used to cast a skill attack apart from the final fist strike and a hit is landed, increases Mod's DMG dealt. This effect can stack.
When casting the one last fist attack in the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material></color> state, this skill's ATK increases based on the number of effects stacked.
When casting <color=#297DE0>Tremblestrike</color> and landing a hit with it, the Base DMG of <color=#297DE0>Tremblestrike</color> increases based on the number of effects stacked. Removes all stacks when <color=#297DE0>Tremblestrike</color> ends.
simple_strength_description:
Equipping by Roaring Thunder - Thor grants the following effects:
While in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material></color> state, each skill hit triggers a thunderbolt that deals Thunder DMG. Each time <color=#297DE0>Mjölnir</color> is used to cast a non-derivative skill and a hit is landed, or when <color=#297DE0>Járngreipr</color> is used to cast a skill attack apart from the final fist strike and a hit is landed, increases Mod's DMG dealt. This effect can stack.
When casting the last fist attack in the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material></color> state, this skill's Non-DoT ATK increases.
When casting <color=#297DE0>Tremblestrike</color> and landing a hit with it, the Independent DMG of <color=#297DE0>Tremblestrike</color> increases based on the number of effects stacked. Removes all stacks when <color=#297DE0>Tremblestrike</color> ends.

113201.simple_description:
Equipping by Firebrand - Tyr grants the following effects:
Additional effect granted by the Aether Code: <color=#297DE0>Burning Sanction - Ignition</color>: Grants <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(113204)>Scorch Brand</material></color> when launching the powerful attack after catching the returning longsword.
Additional effect granted by the Aether Code: <color=#297DE0>Blazing Punishment - Stillfire</color>: Increases the Base DMG of <color=#297DE0>Flaring Assault</color> depending on the number of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(113204)>Scorch Brand</material></color> expended.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor</material></color> stance, every hit landed with a normal attack grants <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(113204)>Scorch Brands</material></color>.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword</material></color> stance, every skill cast or normal attack triggers an additional skill attack.
Each strike of a normal attack deals additional Fire DMG.
When <color=#297DE0>Flaring Assault</color> is cast, each attack deals additional Fire DMG, then expends <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(113204)>Scorch Brands</material></color>.
When <color=#297DE0>Pyro Predator</color> is cast, each attack deals additional Fire DMG.
Additional skill attacks that are triggered this way deal more damage upon hitting.

107501.simple_description:
Equipping by Untainted Heart - Lingguang grants the following effects:
A skill cast in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame mode</material></color> increases the Crit Rate and Attribute DMG of all team members.
Increases the chance of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107507)>Burning Sun</material></color>.
Extends the duration of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107508)>Blazing Sun</material></color>.
Shortens the duration of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107509)>Afire</material></color>.
Extends the duration of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107510)>Alight</material></color>.

107001.simple_description:
Equipping by Tenblaze - Jinwu grants the following effects:
Grants <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material></color> Mark when Mod jumps into the air or returns to the ground.
Reduces the number of enemy hits needed to obtain the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material></color> Mark while casting <color=#297DE0>Penglai Swordplay</color> in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material></color> state.
<color=#297DE0>Evil Incineration</color> no longer expends <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material></color> Marks.
Each time the Mark stack is maxed out, increases Mod's Crit Rate, Max Divine Grace and Divine Grace charge rate.

107101.simple_description:
Equipping by Azure Lord - Mengzhang grants the following effects:
Increases Wind DMG.
Enhances any Attribute DMG boosts obtained through passives.
When Mod lands a Thunder attack on enemies that have been hit by Wind attacks from any team member, it reduces their Thunder and Wind RES.
Increases Crit Rate when a hit is landed on an enemy with lowered Thunder RES.
Increases Crit DMG when a hit is landed on an enemy with lowered Wind RES.

107201.simple_description:
Equipping by Omnisight - Luliang grants the following effects:
Extends the duration of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material></color>.
The Wind RES debuff triggered by a <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material></color> joint attack can be stacked.
When the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material></color> effect ends, restores Ultimate Skill charge to teammates, and an explosion detonates at the position where the Mod followed by the Lucky Coin is, dealing Wind DMG Enemies hit by the explosion will also be inflicted with Armor Break.
When the final strike of <color=#297DE0>Evil Expeller</color> hits, the remaining CD of the Mod's Ultimate Skill will be reduced.
Gains <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material></color> when casting an Ultimate Skill or an Ultimate Skillchain.

107401.simple_description:
Equipping by Winged Gardener - Yingzhao grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skills 1, 2, and 3.
Up to 3 derivative skills can exist at the same time. Switching derivative skills after a Mobile Dodge no longer requires Divine Grace, and casting derivative skills no longer costs Divine Grace..
After dodging, increases the Mod's Independent DMG.

107601.simple_description:
Equipping by TaiYi - Gengchen grants the following effects:
Increases the Final DMG of Tian Yuan Mods.
Increases the Melee and Ranged DMG of Tian Yuan Mods.
For enemies inflicted with Stasis due to being hit by a hurled enemy, shortens their interval time of Statis infliction.
Boosts the effect of Armor Break inflicted by this Mod on all enemies on the field.
Increases the Mod's Independent DMG dealt to levitated enemies or enemies in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(107605)>Abysmal</material></color> state.
When an enemy with Mod Index enters the battlefield or exits Modified Mode, increases its Mod Index.

105501.simple_description:
Equipping by So-ei - Kuramitsuha grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 3.
Increases the effect of each stack of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(105501)>Frost</material></color>.
Further lowers the Ice RES of enemies hit by a follow-up <color=#297DE0>Frost Breaker</color> attack, and further lowers Ice RES of enemies hit by a <color=#297DE0>So-ei Strike</color> crit attack from the Aether Code: <color=#297DE0>Frosted Godblood: Shadow</color>.
Removes all enemy Control RES buffs and points when Mod enters Modified Mode. When in Modified Mode, each time a Control state is inflicted on the enemy, their Control RES points are reset and an ice blast occurs, dealing Ice DMG. There is a limit to how many times this effect can be triggered per Modified Mode.
Increases DMG dealt for every hit landed on the enemy with a follow-up <color=#297DE0>Frost Breaker</color> or a follow-up <color=#297DE0>So-ei Strike</color>.

104901.simple_description:
Equipping by Flower of Yomi - Izanami grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skills 1 and 2.
When <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material></color> is gained, restores HP to the Mod.
When Aether Code: <color=#297DE0>Ice Mirror From Afterlife - Glaciated</color> is active in Modified Mode, the Code will not be triggered and the Mod's hits inflict Freeze on enemies not in Freeze state until Modified Mode ends. For every certain numbers of hits landed by the Mod on an enemy in Freeze state, removes the enemy's Freeze state and triggers an additional skill attack.
After triggering the Dodge effect by dodging <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material></color> shards, increases the Non-DoT ATK of <color=#297DE0>Broken Mirror: Dark</color> for the next several hits. After triggering the Dodge effect by parrying <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material></color> shards with <color=#297DE0>Higan: Chibiki</color>, increases the Non-DoT ATK of <color=#297DE0>Broken Mirror: Secret</color> for the next several hits.

115801.simple_description:
Equipping by Madoibi Scorched - Kagutsuchi grants the following effects:
Charge bar's charge rate increases.
Each time the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material></color> state ends, Crit DMG increases.
When <color=#297DE0>Madoibi Flicker</color> or <color=#297DE0>Flashfire Execution</color> are cast as follow-up attacks within a short time after <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material></color> is leveled up, their Non-DoT ATK are increased.
Once <color=#297DE0>Flashfire Execution</color> ends and <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material></color> level reaches the maximum, <color=#297DE0>Flashfire Execution</color>'s remaining CD is shortened.

106001.simple_description:
Equipping by Nine-Tailed Guardian - Luwu grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 3.
<color=#297DE0>Crashing Spear</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Crashing Mountain</color> when in range of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material></color>.
When the Mod is not within range of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material></color>, the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material></color> will move to you if you cast <color=#297DE0>Counterspear</color> or <color=#297DE0>Roaring Tiger</color>.
Recovers Rage the first time <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material></color> ends.
<color=#297DE0>Spear Array: Nine</color> deals more Non-DoT Crit DMG to Elite and Boss enemies.
Increases Independent DMG when <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material></color> is active.

106101.simple_description:
Equipping by Ethereal Enigma - Zhiming grants the following effects:
Increases Independent DMG.
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 3.
The first time an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain is cast, replaces <color=#297DE0>True Epiphany</color> with <color=#297DE0>Calculation: Hyperorder</color>. After that, <color=#297DE0>True Epiphany</color> is replaced with <color=#297DE0>Calculation: Hyperorder</color> every two times an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain is cast.
Increases maximum Divine Grace and automatically restores Divine Grace. Also restores Divine Grace every time <color=#297DE0>Calculation</color> or <color=#297DE0>Calculation: Hyperorder</color> is activated.

115001.simple_description:
Equipping by Somezakura - Buzenbo Tengu grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skills 1, 2, and 3.
When not in the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material></color> state, Normal Attacks, <color=#297DE0>Kata 1: Crack</color> and <color=#297DE0>Kata 3: Lightning</color> grants more Divine Grace.
Gains a certain amount of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Ominous Blossom</material></color> points upon entering the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Sakuya</material></color> state.
When landing a hit with the final attack of <color=#297DE0>Kata 1: Crack</color> or <color=#297DE0>Kata 3: Lightning</color> hits, or when landing a hit with the final attack of the third successive strike of <color=#297DE0>Kata 1: Halt</color> or <color=#297DE0>Kata 3: Dance</color>, an additional attack will be triggered, dealing Thunder DMG.

101501.simple_description:
Equipping by The Lioness - Sekhmet grants the following effects:
Resets the CD for <color=#297DE0>Tear & Devour</color> and restores Divine Grace to full when entering Modified Mode.
<color=#297DE0>Tear & Devour</color> now lowers more Physical RES of enemies with each stack.
Increases the Non-DoT Base DMG of <color=#297DE0>Foe Shredder</color>.
When casting an Ultimate Skill or an Ultimate Skillchain, increases the Non-DoT Crit Rate of the whole team's Physical attacks.

109501.simple_description:
Equipping by Gray Ibis - Thoth grants the following effects:
Increases Independent DMG.
Increases the Base DMG of Skills 1, 2, and 3.
Automatically restores Energy at a certain interval. Restores Energy upon exit from <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material></color> state.
Use of <color=#297DE0>Dance on edge</color> or <color=#297DE0>Silverdrop</color> when not in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material></color> state replaces <color=#297DE0>Dance on edge</color> and <color=#297DE0>Silverdrop</color> with <color=#297DE0>Spin on edge</color> and <color=#297DE0>Shadowcut</color> respectively as well as resets the CDs of <color=#297DE0>Spin on edge</color> and <color=#297DE0>Shadowcut</color>. Then, use of any skill reverts <color=#297DE0>Spin on edge</color> and <color=#297DE0>Shadowcut</color> to <color=#297DE0>Dance on edge</color> and <color=#297DE0>Silverdrop</color> respectively.
Use of <color=#297DE0>Spin on edge</color> when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material></color> state replaces <color=#297DE0>Spin on edge</color> with <color=#297DE0>The Stitch: Edge</color>, while use of <color=#297DE0>Shadowcut</color> in said state replaces <color=#297DE0>Shadowcut</color> with <color=#297DE0>The Stitch: Thread</color>. Use of <color=#297DE0>The Stitch: Edge</color> or <color=#297DE0>The Stitch: Thread</color> after reverts <color=#297DE0>The Stitch: Edge</color> and <color=#297DE0>The Stitch: Thread</color> to <color=#297DE0>Spin on edge</color> and <color=#297DE0>Shadowcut </color> respectively.

128401.simple_description:
Equipping by Dimglare - Verthandi grants the following effects:
Increases Independent DMG.
Increases the Base DMG of Skills 1, 2, and 3.
Hits landed with <color=#297DE0>Slash of Glare</color> also reduce the Light RES of the enemy hit.
Every point of Divine Grace expended with <color=#297DE0>Flash</color> or <color=#297DE0>Choice</color> increases the non-DoT Skill DMG on hit.
Entering Modified Mode also resets the CDs of <color=#297DE0>Flash of Brilliance</color> and <color=#297DE0>Ripple of Fate</color>.

119701.simple_description:
Equipping by Dreamshade - Oneiroi grants the following effects:
Increases Crit Rate.
If, when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material></color> state Crit Rate is no lower than a certain level, increases teammates' Crit DMG until Ethereal Dream state ends.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(119705)>Roused</material></color> may now stack up to a certain number more times.
Each time <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#297DE0 h=2 event=terminology args=(119705)>Roused</material></color> is triggered, increases damage instances for every Shadow Mod on the team.
Where an ATK boost is provided by the Aether Code: <color=#297DE0>Infinite Illusion: Dreamscene</color>, also grants additional instances based on the number of Shadow Mods on the team.
